segments.text: We were decorating and I ’ m going to ask some things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I ’ ll be glad to help you out . We can deliver what you need to your office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shall we need at one fifteen this Thursday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We definitely need some new filing cabinets and at least one desk unit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine , I ’ ll bring both our office furniture and equipment catalogs on Thursday .
segments.speaker: S1
